queryMap.query: MERGE INTO TBDM_AUTH_APLY_DEPT RM USING ( SELECT VU.ASSO_CD , VU.DEPT_CD , VU.TEAM_CD , VU.USER_ID FROM VWEA_USER VU WHERE VU.USER_ID = ? ) TR ON ( RM.USER_ID = TR.USER_ID ) WHEN MATCHED THEN --데이터 중복건이 있는경우 Update UPDATE SET RM.ASSO_CD = TR.ASSO_CD , RM.DEPT_CD = TR.DEPT_CD , RM.TEAM_CD = TR.TEAM_CD WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN -- 중복건이 없는 경우 처리 Insert INSERT ( RM.USER_ID , RM.ASSO_CD , RM.DEPT_CD , RM.TEAM_CD , RM.INST_ID , RM.INST_DT ) VALUES ( TR.USER_ID , TR.ASSO_CD , TR.DEPT_CD , TR.TEAM_CD , ? , SYSDATE )

SELECT /* tbdm_auth_aply_dept_ff001 IWORK_SFR-014 */ '0' AS DELAUTH_CHK, '0' AS AUTH_CHK, A.USER_ID, A.DEPT_CD PRE_DEPT_CD, ( SELECT GROUP_NAME FROM USRBM.V_GROUP C WHERE C.GROUP_ID = A.DEPT_CD ) PRE_DEPT_NM, A.TEAM_CD PRE_TEAM_CD, ( SELECT GROUP_NAME FROM USRBM.V_GROUP C WHERE C.GROUP_ID = A.TEAM_CD ) PRE_TEAM_NM, B.USER_NM, B.DEPT_CD CUR_DEPT_CD, B.DEPT_NM CUR_DEPT_NM, B.TEAM_CD CUR_TEAM_CD, B.TEAM_NM CUR_TEAM_NM FROM TBDM_AUTH_APLY_DEPT A, VWEA_USER B WHERE A.USER_ID = B.USER_ID AND A.TEAM_CD <> B.TEAM_CD AND A.TEAM_CD LIKE '%' || NVL( ?, A.TEAM_CD ) || '%' AND B.USER_NM LIKE '%' || NVL( ?, B.USER_NM ) || '%' ORDER BY B.DEPT_NM
UPDATE TBDM_AUTH_APLY_DEPT SET /* tbdm_auth_aply_dept_ua001 IWORK_SFR-014 */ DEPT_CD = ? --사용자 ,TEAM_CD = ? --장비구분 ,INST_ID = ? --작성자 ,INST_DT = SYSDATE --작성일시 WHERE USER_ID = ?

UPDATE TBDM_MN_AUTH_HIST /* tbdm_auth_aply_dept_da001 IWORK_SFR-014 */ SET END_DT_TM = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE - 1/24/60, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MI') WHERE USER_ID = ? AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHH24MI') BETWEEN STR_DT_TM AND END_DT_TM
DELETE TBDM_AUTH_APLY_DEPT /* tbdm_auth_aply_dept_da002 IWORK_SFR-014 */ WHERE USER_ID = ?
SELECT /* IWORK_SFR-014 */ GROUP_ID TEAM_CD ,GROUP_NAME TEAM_NM FROM USRBM.V_GROUP DEPT WHERE GROUP_ID LIKE 'GA12%' ORDER BY GROUP_ORDER
